quoteText: National Geographic activities and services will be legally and ethically conducted by treating employees, environments, and cultures with respect. We will minimize negative environmental impacts and greenhouse gas emissions by seeking local, organic, and sustainably-sourced resources, using recycled and recyclable content when possible, and minimizing waste of energy, water, food, and other resources.
title: The service provides information about its attitude towards ethical, social or political problems or controversies
